text: Welcome to SDRC's Virtual Lobby! Welcome to SDRC's Virtual Lobby! The SDRC Virtual Lobby is open during the following days and times (except holidays): Mondays: 9:00am-12:00pm; 1:00pm-4:00pm Wednesday: 9:00am-12:00pm; 1:00pm-2:30pm Fridays: 9:00am-12:00pm; 1:00pm-4:00pm To ENTER the Virtual Lobby, go to:  https://ucr.zoom.us/j/92922737639?pwd=c1M5aXRmSWMrUHpLYTdISEhJK24vdz09 How else may you reach SDRC? The SDRC operates during regular business hours, Monday-Friday, 8:00am-5:00pm, and may be reached by: Phone: 951-827-3861 Email:  sdrc@ucr.edu Website:  https://sdrc.ucr.edu Would you like to request an appointment with a SDRC staff member? Please complete an Appointment Request Form ( https://bit.ly/33QbqPv ) and someone will respond to you as soon as possible, during regular business hours.
